scripts.docker: npm run docker-stop && npm run docker-build && npm run docker-launch
scripts.docker-launch: docker run -v $(pwd)/dist/images:/static/images -v /tmp/server_logs:/var/log/server -p 8000:80 --name cool_cucumber --detach --rm blakesley && open http://localhost:8000
scripts.docker-push: docker tag blakesley shawnblakesley/server && docker login && docker push shawnblakesley/server
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run docker
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run docker-build && npm run docker-push && ./tools/deploy.sh
